name: Mirar
description:
Warning: This game contains repeating patterns and flashing lights that may cause disconfort or may trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #47. The theme is simmetry, with the Unusual Look wildcard.

I made this to try out some 2d rendering techniques in godot aimed at creating unique scene compositions. Partially inspired by Earthbound combat screens and by Yume Nikki exploration.

Controls 

Arrow Keys / WASD to move 

Tab / E to equip the bike (to move faster) after you obtain it.
